intro: Memecylon nodosum var. nodosum, commonly known as the knotted memecylon, is a shrub native to tropical regions of Africa and Asia. It belongs to the family Meliaceae, which includes mahogany and related trees. The plant is characterized by its small, simple leaves and clusters of yellow-green flowers. Its fruit is a capsule that splits open to release small, winged seeds. It is often found in moist, shaded habitats such as forests and along stream banks.
